item.title: Roomba zones in Home Assistant
item.description: There doesn’t appear to be a straightforward way to have Home Assistant work with custom Roomba zones. It takes some legwork. I’ve designated a Roomba zone around our Litter-Robot with the intention of having the vacuum clean up any stray litter after one of the cats uses the litter box. But in order to get a Home Assistant script to send the Roomba to that zone, I need to know the Roomba’s pmap_id and region_id fields from the iRobot API.
